data.text: @lakhanchouhn Sir, this is not the experience we wish you to have with us. Could you please share the PIR  (property irregularity report) if this was reported at the arrivals via DM so we may look into it? ~Kritika  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@manojpathak9984 Mr Pathak, we regret such an experience with us. We're raising this with the concerned team for necessary measures and we look forward to serving you well in future flights with us. ~Kritika
@jak_arunkumar Hello, allow us some time ,we are getting this checked. ~Diyashi
@sanketsrivasta5 Hello, we understand you concern. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@AsharNeel Most welcome. ~Kritika
@Iagreewithyoub1 Hello, could you please share your PNR along with the transaction details via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AsharNeel Hello, please ask your sister to get in touch with our team at the airport. They shall assist you. ~Diyashi
@RohitSi44166354 Hello, could you please share the PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@AsharNeel Hello, allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@anuragschandra We regret the inconvenience caused, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. Further please know, we shall share the feedback with the concerned team. ~Diyashi   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@tweetchow_ We regret to hear this, sir. As checked the seat was changed due to change in the aircraft. Please know we have refunded the seat fee. ~Diyashi
@shimonabagga We regret to hear this. We never intend to provide such an experience. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@VeerVersatile We regret to hear this. Could you please share the PNR via DM, so we may get it checked, further we have noted your feedback. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@fd453511e4a44b8 Hello, we have replied to you in DM, kindly check. ~Diyashi

@anindasardar Sir, this is not the kind of service we wish to provide you. Please share your PNR with us so we may share stern feedback with our team. ~Prahlad
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@anjanibajpai Hello, we regret to hear this. Could please share the PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@bharathanadham Thank you for the shout out. We are happy that the surprise was enjoyed by all of you. Congratulations on the successful program. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may pass on the kudos to the team. #GoIndiGo  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@brentodiana Hello, please know, this is fake, we are sharing this with the concerned team. You may visit https://t.co/mTUeOuBTGu, for all the job related information. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Icon
urls.description: IndiGo a leading Domestic & International Indian Airlines which offers always cheap affordable, on time and hassle free operation at the Low cost, Discount Airline Tickets, Cheap flights to India & abroad, Online Flight Booking to India, Bangkok - Thailand, Dubai - United Arab Emirates and Singapore, Budget Airlines India and Indian airlines with lowest air fares in India & Abroad.

data.text: @SouravDuttagu11 We regret to hear this, sir. We understand it can be very disappointing. We are getting this checked, allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@Prateek_jain87 Mr Jain, we regret to hear this. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@AnuragK61638177 Mr Kumar, please reach the airport 2.30 hr prior to the departure and report at the IndiGo reservation counter outside the airport and the staff shall assist you with the wheelchair. ~Diyashi
@NITINTIBREWAL Sir, one of our team members will connect and assist you soon. ~Diyashi
@jailodha13 Hello sir, allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@chamundikashyap We regret to hear this, sir.  Allow us sometime we are getting this checked. ~Diyashi
@Musafir_Amit_ Hello, we understand your concern, could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@VasuDev78309478 Sir, we believe our team member got connected and assisted you in the best possible way. ~Diyashi
@nikhilpghag We regret the inconvenience, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get the matter checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@M_M_Mind Sir, thank you for the shout out. This just made our day better. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may pass on appreciation. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@RIBPL3 Hello, as checked it is a connecting flight, and the baggage will be received at the final destination on arrival, and please know Hyderabad has 1 terminal, hence no terminal change is required. Do let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi
@RIBPL3 We are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@Smit_Shah21 We regret the hassle, as checked the flight got delayed due to late arrival of the incoming  aircraft. We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi
@Niraj80344020 Hi Niraj, we regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@OMRcat Mr Thomas, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us your Contact Number, so we may connect with you to gather more details on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Shahrukh_eng Hi, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us the registered Contact Number and Email ID updated in the booking along with the Transaction ID to check. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@rajkuttalam We are looking into this and request you to DM us for further communication on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ChaitaliChatt19 We regret the inconvenience caused and look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi
@nikman0109 Mr Mandowara, we believe our Customer Experience Team assisted you with the same. Do let us know in case you need more assistance and we wish you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi

@1d48574af1f14af Mr Gala, we regret the experience. We always want to ensure the Check-In Baggage of passengers arrives in a safe condition. However, minor wear and tear may occur during the loading and offloading of the bag. Res, we have noted your feedback in this regard. ~Navi
@prohra1 Mr Rohra, we believe you have received your luggage as of now. We once again regret the inconvenience and look forward to serving you in a better way in the near future. ~Navi
@kya_soncha_phir Mr Khan, Air Suvidha Form is discontinued and the same isn't required to be filled anymore. You may visit https://t.co/DjVbpwSsWb to check the Travel Guidelines. Thanks. ~Navi

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @avani_t96 Hi, customers are allowed to carry a Powerbank of upto 100 WH in their Hand Baggage. We hope this helps. ~Navi

data.text: @skyadav_bh Mr Yadav, thanks for flying with us. We request you to DM us the PNR and your Contact Number so we may check what best can be done. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Devika86707557 Hi Devika, please let us know via DM what went wrong, so we may check and assist accordingly. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@artfuldodger098 Hi, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please DM us your PNR and Contact Number so we may check and assist accordingly. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@SmitPat46206343 Mr Patel, please DM us your Contact Number, so we may connect with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi
@gauravstvnews Be assured, this is being looked into and we shall connect with you again after a diligent investigation. (2/2) ~Navi
@gauravstvnews Mr Mishra, thank you for allowing us to speak with you tonight. We believe you have collected your luggage and sincerely regret the long wait and hassle you had to go through. (1/2)
@krishnamohan_js Thanks. Our team will get in touch with you in the morning. ~Navi

@AbuZakiRak1 Mr Sulaiman, we request you to DM us your registered Contact Number and Email ID so we may share the same with our Concerned Team for further review. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@meeshugupta1024 Ms Gupta, we regret the inconvenience caused to you. Our flight operations are dependent on several factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. Rest, your feedback is well noted and we wish to serve you in a better way in the near future. ~Navi

@krishnamohan_js @JM_Scindia @MoCA_GoI Mr Reddy, we tried to connect with you, however, the given contact on the PNR is that of a travel agency. We request you to share your contact number with us over DM https://t.co/liiMCmalbR so we can speak with you at the earliest. ~Yashica

data.text: @free_rider Mr Gandhi, please be informed, wearing a mask is no more mandatory as per the regulatory authorities, effective 17/11/2022. However, it remains a preferable option. ~Linda
@1d48574af1f14af Mr Gala, this is unfortunate. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SonthiPuru Hi, we're glad to know Ritum was able to ensure a smooth travel experience for you. We shall pass on your message to him. :) ~Linda

@akashkarmakar73 Mr Karmakar, we've assigned you 29EF in the first sector. You may now proceed to web check-in. Further we shall highlight the glitch to the concerned team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@akhiljain48 Sir, we would like to look into this on priority and regret the inconvenience caused. Please share your PNR with us over DM along with your calling number so we can connect. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@nikman0109 Mr Mandowara, could you please share a screenshot of the error with us over DM along with your PNR and email so we may assist you? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@HarpalS62885499 Mr Singh, we would like to speak with you and request you to share your contact details with us over DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF. ~Yashica
@freako_me Hi, we've responded to your DM. ~Linda
@M_P_Coleman Mr Coleman, we regret to note your disappointment. Please DM us your concern a bit more in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Zahidma55466057 Hi, we'd like to connect with you. Please share a convenient time with us through DM and an available contact so we can address the same. ~Yashica
@WriterBirth Mr Singh, we request you to allow some time to look into this and we will surely get back to you with an update. ~Yashica
@retireonmars Hi, Sir. Could you please confirm the PNR details via DM so we may assist you further? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@PratyashaDas96 Ms Das, we'd like to connect with you in this regard. Please share the PNR details with us over DM, your contact number as well as a convenient time to speak to you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@vishalsukhija Mr Sukhija, this is not the experience we intend for our customers to have and we assure you, unprofessionalism is not at all accepted at IndiGo. Could you DM us the PNR so we can take a closer look into this? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@naseembioinfo Dr Khan, we regret your recent ravel experience with us and are getting this checked by our team. We request your patience during this interim. ~Yashica
@MajeeDebranjan We truly feel bad to know that you had to miss your interview. We hope to provide you better experience next time you travel with us. ~Sheetal
@sarvgun Mr Singh, this is unfortunate! Did you inform our airport team upon arrival? Please DM us in detail. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Moveribfan Dr Gupta, a convenience fee is levied on tickets purchased through our website/app, where the form of payment is credit/debit card or net banking. It is the online transaction charge collected on behalf of the bank. ~Linda
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

data.text: @UtkarshTM Sir, glad to know our team was able to assist you board the flight just in time. :) ~Linda

@UjjwalBhakat Sir, we truly regret the schedule change and we never intend to disrupt our flyers' travel plans. We see that our team assisted you with an alternate flight move on the given date. Should you require further assistance, we are just a DM away. ~Yashica

@TIWARIKSHITIZ Hi, you may reach out to us at 0124-6173838, 0124-4973838 or write to us at customer.relations@goindigo.in. You might as well share your concern here via DM. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@neerajjverma Mr Verma, we never wish to cause our customers any discomfort and completely understand that delays can be very tiring after traveling. We have highlighted this to our team and hope to avoid such hold-ups in the future. ~Yashica

@NitishPandey084 Mr Pandey, we regret to note this and request you to DM https://t.co/liiMCmalbR us your PNR as well as a copy of the PIR (property irregularity report) issued by the arrival airport so we can raise this with our team. ~Yashica

data.text: @JangidAvani Mr Jangid, what happened? Please DM us in detail what went wrong along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@murtuza012 Mr Rangwala, please DM us the PNR so we can get this checked further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@gjnijenhuis Yes, it is allowed, provided the booking is against a single PNR. ~Linda

@ganesh_sampath Mr Ganesh, please be informed, anything left behind in the airport premises which is beyond the purview of the airline is submitted to the lost & found dept. of the airport authority. We'd request you to get in touch with the concerned team to retrieve the lost article. ~Linda

@Kalepatil_11 Sir, we'd request you to get in touch with the airport team right away for any assistance in this regard. Further, we're sharing your feedback with the concerned team for necessary review. ~Linda
@ChaitaliChatt19 Hi, sorry for the wait. We'd request you to contact our airport team right away for any assistance in this regard. Meanwhile, we're also checking with the team. ~Linda
@kausik_deb1 Mr Deb, we would like to take a closer look into this and request you to DM https://t.co/liiMCmalbR us your PNR. ~Yashica

data.text: @AbbottH Mr Abbott, sorry to keep you waiting. We'd request you to contact our airport team right away for assistance in this regard. Meanwhile, we're also checking the same with the airport team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Kouboyprasad Mr Prasad, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Sukanta85707021 Mr Bhattacharjee, we have processed a full refund to the travel agency’s account. We request you to please get in touch with them to get the amount transferred in your original mode of payment which might take up to 5-7 working days. ~Linda

@sandy17172 Dr Juneja, what happened? We would like to connect with you to address your concern and request you to share your PNR as well as your current contact number with us over DM. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@armohd05 Mr Rahman, we completely understand your sentiment and assure you this feedback is being readily highlighted to our team in Hyderabad. We hope to provide you with a better experience on your future flights with us. ~Yashica
@_im_0kay_ Mr Saini, you can carry both in check-in baggage. ~Linda
@VagaaBond007 Sir, we've replied to your DM. Please check. ~Shreya
@VSVENKS Sir, we believe our team has contacted and assisted with the concern. Thanks! ~Shreya
@ArunR_Guru Mr Sharma, we request you to assist us with your PNR over DM so we can check what happened here with our concerned team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mukesh_batra Mr Batra, we certainly do not wish to deliver such an experience to our customers. Please DM us your PNR so we can take a closer look at this. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@SameerSBagul Mr Bagul, this is not the experience we wish to deliver. Please share the PNR details with us via DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF so we can take a closer look into this and connect with you. ~Yashica
@Annjusti Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@VSVENKS Sir, our team will connect with you soon. ~Shreya
@ASIFIQBAL_WANI Sir, we request you to share more details on your concern with us over DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF. We would like to take a closer look. ~Yashica

@pushpendrpratik Sir, we understand that spotting mosquitoes on-board is definitely discomforting and we take such feedback seriously. While all our aircrafts undergo fumigation before every flight departure, moving forward-our team will take better in-flight measures. ~Yashica
@amarendra We regret the experience once again and hope to serve you better in your future flights with us. ~Yashica <2/2>

@amarendra Sir, we understand that spotting mosquitoes on-board is definitely upsetting and we take such feedback seriously. While all our aircrafts undergo fumigation before every flight departure, we request you to reach out to our crew for immediate assistance. <1/2>

@DarshanJGowda Sir, at IndiGo, all our pilots undergo rigorous training and go through periodic proficiency checks. The safety of our flyers is prime to us and at no point in time will our pilots compromise on the same. Nevertheless, be assured, we will definitely look into this. ~Yashica
@JavedPsychia Be rest assured that your feedback is duly noted and has been highlighted further for a review. We hope to serve you better in your future travel with us. ~Shreya 2/2
